divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were sitting on a wooden jungle jim behind moon mt. elementry school talking late at night. it was a calm very quiet night. i believe it may have been in fall. for some reason i looked up at the stars . we lived at the edge of the desert with a mountian to the east of us. i thought it was a hangglider with red lights at the nose and tips of a plane. i told scott what the hell is he doing at night hang gliding. then i relized i could see the stars in between the lights. the objects moved in perfect triangular formation very, veryslow no noise, like a dead calm. they circled right over head staying in a perfect formation,scott ran home to get a telescope. i watched them move slowly torwards s. mountain then picking up speed. once over s. mountain one shot off to the left torwards space the other two shot right in a flash torwards space at an unbeliveable speed. by the time scott got back they were gone. i have only told this to family. i try to watch every program that stanton friedman is on this ismy first time for telling this to any one outside the family. i believe 3 days after this their was an article in the paper that somewhere in the middle east some people saw the exact same thing we saw. this happend a long time ago but i remember it like yesterday. till this day i have not seen any thing on earth like i saw that night. thank you tony sasso
